Html:
Dear All,
I Have WSUS 6.3 (2012R2) And I have CA in my Environment, I followed your steps that are shown in the Document "Creating a Code Signing Certificate", But i noticed when you generated the Code Signing Certificate in step #2 that you selected "My User Account" in order to request the new Certificate.
My Question is , Am I supposed to choose "My Computer Account" in order to request this new certificate ? because by the steps followed in the manual this certificate will be issued to the user account not the WSUS computer Account
I'm not an expert in PKI, but the most important thing is to import the certificat into the 'Computer profile' when importing into "Trusted publisher" and "Trusted editor"
